message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%
I'll give you a slightly better deal. You can take 60% and I'll take 40%.
Let's be reasonable. I'll take 80% and you take 20%, or we can keep playing and lose more money to inflation.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up too much. You can take 70% and I'll take 30%.
